          <title>
            <string language="en">Analogy of a moving dislocation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analogie einer beweglichen Versetzung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analogie d'une dislocation mobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analogia de um dislocation movente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analogia di una dislocazione commovente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογία μιας κινούμενης εξάρθρωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analogía de una dislocación móvil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a moving dislocation can be demonstrated using a carpet wrinkle analogy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carpet wrinkle analogy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moving dislocation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic deformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slip plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie eine bewegliche 
Versetzung mit einer Teppichknicke Analogie demonstriert werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment une dislocation
mobile peut être démontrée en utilisant une analogie de ride de 
tapis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um dislocation 
movente pode ser demonstrado usando uma analogia do enrugamento do 
tapete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come una dislocazione
commovente può essere dimostrata usando un'analogia della grinza 
della moquette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς μια κινούμενη 
εξάρθρωση μπορεί να καταδειχθεί χρησιμοποιώντας μια αναλογία 
ρυτίδων ταπήτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo una dislocación 
móvil se puede demostrar usando una analogía de la arruga de la 
alfombra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teppichknicke Analogie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
